SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS THE ORGANIZATION PERFORMS ONGOING REVIEWS OF GRANTEE TO ENSURE THAT THE GRANTS ARE GRANTED ONLY TO THOSE ORGANIZATIONS WHO MEET THE CRITERIA TO BE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE GRANTS. IN ADDITION, THE ORGANIZATION RESERVES THE RIGHT TO REVIEW THE BOOKS AND RECORDS OF THE GRANTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: PROCEDURES FOR MONITORING THE USE OF GRANT FUNDS THE ORGANIZATION PERFORMS ONGOING REVIEWS OF GRANTEE TO ENSURE THAT THE GRANTS ARE GRANTED ONLY TO THOSE ORGANIZATIONS AND INDIVIDUALS WHO MEET THE CRITERIA TO BE ELIGIBLE TO RECEIVE GRANTS. IN ADDITION, THE ORGANIZATION RESERVES THE RIGHT TO REVIEW THE BOOKS AND RECORDS OF THE GRANTEES.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 11B
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: THE FORM 990 PREPARER SENDS THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS A DRAFT COPY OF THE COMPLETE FORM 990 FOR REVIEW AND COMMENTS. AFTER THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS APPROVES THE FORM THEY NOTIFY THE FORM 990 PREPARER AND A FINAL VERSION OF THE FORM 990 IS SENT TO THE PRESIDENT. THE PRESIDENT THEN SIGNS THE E-FILE AUTHORIZATION FORM AND RETURNS IT TO THE FORM 990 PREPARER. THE PREPARER THEN E-FILES THE RETURN.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION B, LINE 12C
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: ENFORCEMENTS OF CONFLICTS POLICY OFFICERS ARE REQUIRED TO DISCLOSE ANY POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST. FAILURE TO DISCLOSE A POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST OR ENGAGING IN A PRACTICE DETERMINED TO BE A CONFLICT OF INTEREST MAY RESULT IN DISCIPLINARY ACTION UP TO AND INCLUDING TERMINATION.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: FORM 990, PART VI, SECTION C, LINE 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: GOVERNING DOCUMENTS DISCLOSURE EXPLANATION UPON REQUEST, THE PUBLIC MAY VIEW THE ORGANIZATION'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS AND RELATED DOCUMENTS AT THE ADDRESS LOCATED ON PAGE 1 OF FORM 990.
